mapper.select: SELECT id, title, TO_CHAR("start", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "start", TO_CHAR("end", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "end", memo FROM scheduleinfo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheduleinfo(id, title, "start","end",memo) VALUES(calId_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{memo})
mapper.update: UPDATE scheduleinfo SET "start" =TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , "end" = TO_DATE(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE id = #{id}
